titles: The sinners supplication Confessing his sins, and humbly craving pardon of the Lord: he hateth the world, and desireth to inhabit in the heavenly Ierusalem: and the description thereof. To the tune of, Troy toune.
publisher: for Henry Gosson, dwelling on London Bridge,
notes: Verse - "O gratious God and heavenly King,".
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
